message: UA is throwing a party with some other True companies: http://bigbangbordello.com/
Tumblr is throwing a developer party, but in typical Tumblr style there's no info yet. Watch http://staff.tumblr.com for details.
OK, I'm wrong. There's a spreadsheet to fill out if you're interested in going. LOLSOB http://bit.ly/dOTVqw
My company, SimpleGeo is going to be throwing a party with Apigee, SendGrid and Twilio. Open bar from 10p-4a. It's going to be awesome. http://getdownparty.com
getting a 404 on that last url
@mg Is that invite-only, or can a dude just getting back from Afghanistan (me) attend? :) I'll be at SXSW representing my co, Beta Inc.
chomp, blekko, hipmunk, sv, and aplusk party sunday night will be on point!
This will be my first time around SXSW. Planning to do mostly the free parties :p Kind of on a tight budget :S
@aplusk looks like it's official, so badges required yeah?

@aplusk  @ekai  @jeffrock  @jonrohan  @mtrichardson  @mhendric  @cdmoyer You are all invited to join me (the day after I'm back from Afghanistan) Saturday evening for the BetaCandy & StartupList SXSW Kick Off event. Naval Ravikant and Wayne Sutton will also be there... Please see >> http://plancast.com/p/4c6l Thanks for your support :)

If anyone is still there Fri at 7pm there is a screening of Another Happy Day at the Paramount Theater directed by Sam Levison. Great cast that I was so fortunate to ba a part of. Screened at SUndance. Chk it out http://schedule.sxsw.com/events/event_FS11173
